Title: Relates to requiring the department of health to prepare a biennial report on the number of available ventilators at each hospital located within the state
Summary: Relates to requiring the department of health to prepare a biennial report on the number of available ventilators at each hospital located within the state and to make recommendations on the number of ventilators to meet the needs of a pandemic or regional disease outbreak.
ActClause: AN ACT requiring the department of health to prepare a biennial report on the number of available ventilators at each hospital located within the state
